checks.title: Outbox pending queue
checks.sql:
SELECT id
FROM "EventOutbox"
WHERE status = 'PENDING'
  AND "eventType" LIKE 'notify.%'
  AND ("nextRetryAt" IS NULL OR "nextRetryAt" <= NOW())
ORDER BY "createdAt" ASC
LIMIT 50

checks.title: Outbox stale sending recovery
checks.sql:
SELECT id
FROM "EventOutbox"
WHERE status = 'SENDING'
  AND "eventType" LIKE 'notify.%'
  AND "updatedAt" < NOW() - interval '5 minute'
LIMIT 50

checks.title: Communications due tasks
checks.sql:
SELECT id
FROM "CommunicationTask"
WHERE status = 'SCHEDULED'
  AND "archivedAt" IS NULL
  AND ("scheduledAt" IS NULL OR "scheduledAt" <= NOW())
ORDER BY "createdAt" ASC
LIMIT 50

checks.title: Data import stale jobs
checks.sql:
SELECT id
FROM "DataImportJob"
WHERE status = 'PROCESSING'
  AND "startedAt" < NOW() - interval '2 hour'
ORDER BY "startedAt" ASC
LIMIT 50

checks.title: Portal staff list hot path
checks.sql:
SELECT id
FROM "Staff"
WHERE "merchantId" = $1
ORDER BY "createdAt" DESC
LIMIT 200
